explanations: I chose this theta because the number of sheep has increased slightly, but the wolf population has decreased significantly. By hunting at a moderate intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves while still taking advantage of the available prey. This balance helps ensure my survival in a challenging environment.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep has increased, providing a better opportunity for hunting. However, with the recent decrease in the wolf population, I need to be cautious and not overexert myself. A moderate intensity allows me to hunt effectively while conserving energy for future needs.

By hunting at a moderate intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves, while still taking advantage of the available prey. I chose this theta because with the decrease in the wolf population, hunting at a slightly higher intensity than my previous choice allows me to compete better for food while still being cautious. The increase in sheep means there is more food available, so a moderate increase in intensity can help ensure my survival without risking overexertion.
vocalizations: Growwllllllll... times are tough, but I will adapt!
